E_AdjustCrystal.name: Precision Attunement Station
E_AdjustCrystal.Description:
Removes the limit of Faint Resist for the whole party.  
When using a Phoscrystal Core, increases the destruction radius on the map by 1 tile.

<color=#5061A4>—— The crystals tune more smoothly now. Instead of dependence, isn’t it better to use them more freely?  
Melancholy-chan... why aren’t you saying anything...</color>
